main event: Witnesses reported seeing unusual reddish objects in the sky over Pottstown, Pennsylvania on 26 Oct 67, which moved rapidly in the NW direction.
interesting points: The objects were described as moving faster than any jet plane the witnesses had ever seen., The witnesses estimated seeing 3 to 4 objects during the observation., The objects appeared to be under intelligent control and navigation., The sighting lasted for about 15-20 minutes., The witnesses included a husband and wife who were both excited about the display.
witness description: A couple who were interested in flying saucers and observed the sighting together.
